meanings.definition: Not currently existing or in use.
meanings.sent1: The nonextant toy was once my favorite, but now I play with other things.
meanings.sent2: The nonextant library card meant I couldn't borrow any books.
meanings.sent3: I searched for my nonextant socks, only to find them in the laundry basket.
meanings.sent4: Her nonextant patience finally ran out after waiting for hours.
meanings.sent5: The nonextant sunflower seeds never grew into tall plants like the others.

meanings.sent1: The nonextant dinosaurs roamed the earth millions of years ago.
meanings.sent2: The nonextant ruins of the castle still held stories of the past.
meanings.sent3: His nonextant phone booth costume was a hit at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The nonextant memories of childhood faded with time.
meanings.sent5: The nonextant stars in the sky twinkled brightly in her imagination.
